src:
Deepika Padukone compliments Ranveer Singh; the latter says 'I must really be looking good today'
05 Nov 2019, 22:38 by TIMESOFINDIA.COM
Ranveer Singh and Deepika Padukone have been giving us major couple goals for a long time now. The couple will be celebrating their first wedding anniversary this month. The duo is quite active on social media and their PDA over Instagram can make you go aww!
And recently, Ranveer went live on his Instagram to have an interaction with his fans. Soon, Deepika dropped an adorable comment on his Instagram live session. She wrote, "looking cute AND hot!"
Ranveer quickly replied, "Thanks baby, wow, a rare compliment from my wife, I must really be looking good today."
Check out the live session here:



Meanwhile, on the work front, Ranveer and Deepika will be sharing screen space in Kabir Khan's sports drama '83'. The film is based on the Indian cricket team's iconic world cup victory in the year 1983. The film has been slated for April 2020 release.
